task.title: Maximize View
task.shortdesc: Maximize a view within the Session Editor window.

taskbody.context: From the Session Editor or an undocked view:

step.cmd: Click the maximize button near the top right corner of the view you wish to maximize, or when the view is focused, press CTRL+M.
step.stepresult: If the view was docked, it will expand to fill the Session Editor window. If the view was undocked, it will expand to fill your computer screen.

step.cmd: To restore the view to its previous size, click the restore button near the top right corner (this button looks like two windows), or press CTRL+N when the view is in focus.
step.stepresult: The view will return to its previous unmaximized position.
